name: ai-test
description: AITest package list for device Appium Tests

scripts.install:drivers:macos: npx appium driver install --source=npm appium-xcuitest-driver && npx appium driver install --source=npm appium-mac2-driver
scripts.update:drivers:macos: npx appium driver update xcuitest && npx appium driver update mac2
scripts.install:drivers: npm run install:drivers:linux && (npm run install:drivers:windows || true) && (npm run install:drivers:macos || true)
scripts.update:drivers: npm run update:drivers:linux && (npm run update:drivers:windows || true) && (npm run update:drivers:macos || true)
